shortMSG:
You are in a kitchen. 
 There are a kitchen island and a pantry.
 You may go check other areas through a backdoor at west side of the kitchen, or a french door at east side of the kitchen.
longMSG:
You are in a kitchen. 
 There are a kitchen island and a pantry.
 You may go check other areas through a backdoor at west side of the kitchen, or a french door at east side of the kitchen.
